Holiday Inn Express Hasselt, an IHG Hotel
column3: The staff was super friendly and accommodating, all precaution measures related to the pandemic were perfectly put in place.
column4: I didn't need the drilling sounds of the works in the lobby before 8am.

column2: Holiday Inn Express Hasselt, an IHG Hotel
column4:
Rooms noisy. Could overhear the neighbor on the phone and follow complete conversation.
Breakfast too standard and cheap

column2: Holiday Inn Express Hasselt, an IHG Hotel
column3: Good central location, parking in front of hotel, very practical room and bathroom.
column4: Breakfast ok, but still influenced by corona measures.

column2: Holiday Inn Express Hasselt, an IHG Hotel
column3: Great location. Friendly, helpful, welcoming and accommodating staff with good customer service plus they all speaks in English. The best breakfast buffet. Especially thanks to Ms. NINA so kind and approachable.
column4: I think it's just the A/C in our room. But i just have noticed a day before i left so i didn't have much time to report it. but somehow it was cooling properly at first.

column2: Holiday Inn Express Hasselt, an IHG Hotel
column3: We get upgraded to the new rooms and their very trendy and cozy. Liked the Croissants..:)
column4: A/C was not activated yet so no climate system.

column2: Holiday Inn Express Hasselt, an IHG Hotel
column3: The location is perfect, the comfort is ok, the breakfast was top (the best taking in count covid19 rules)
